name: Ice Cream Roll!
description:
In this game, you would need to build bridges from.. Ice Cream!

Run through the creamy arena and roll your ice cream scoop, the more you roll, the bigger the ball!

After your scoop is big enough, run with it to build a bridge to the next arena, and the first player to reach the end is the winner!

Use your strategy and skill to time the ice cream scoop size and run to build the bridge or bump into your opponents to drop their ice cream!

Unlock cool achievements and upgrades!

Enjoy!
